item.title: Mentioned by TheTyee.ca
item.description:
The Fierce Optimism of Elizabeth May
Elizabeth May's Historic Night. Canada's first Green MP celebrates with supporters in an airplane hanger full of hope. ... May is an excellent member of Parliament and her storehouse of knowledge on issues stacks up with the best. She also has historical ...

item.title: Mentioned by Inside Climate News
item.description:
Canadian Govt Spent $120 Mil on Research for Enbridge, Greens Say
Federal Green MP Elizabeth May is accusing the federal government of using tax dollars to support the Enbridge Northern Gateway pipeline. May says her party has obtained documents showing $120 million in oil spill-related research is being carried out off ...

item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
Media Advisory: MP Elizabeth May to Deliver Keynote at Save Our Waterfront ...
AJAX, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - Aug. 16, 2013) - Pickering Ajax Citizens Together to Protect our Water (PACT POW) is holding a large community Save Our Waterfront MAYDAY Rally with special guest MP Elizabeth May, leader of the Green Party.
